description:
When generating RDF data, the first element to declare is a subject. In addition, these subjects may have a class (defined in an ontology) associated using the property rdf:type or directly a if the RDF is in TURTLE.
For the mapping below generate subjects with an URL that is http://sample.com/resource/P{ID} and which class is foaf:Person
solution_template:
<#assign people=providers("HttpProvider", { "method" : "GET", "url" : "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/mappings-data/ldac/people.csv"})>
<#assign peopleRows = people?trim?split("\n")>
<#list peopleRows as personRow>
<#if !personRow?is_first>
<#assign personColumns = personRow?split(",")>
<http://sample.com/resource/[=personColumns[0]]> a <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> .
</#if>
</#list>
